item.title: Happy Saturday! It looks like it's going...
item.description: Happy Saturday! It looks like it's going to be hot and rainy afternoon. It rained for almost 3 hours last night. Definitely in Florida's rainy season, which started a bit late this year. Typically, it kicks off in late May or early June. This year didn't begin until mid to late July.
